description:
The mysterious knight turned out to be Doc trapped in a suit of armor along with several memory stones. The soldiers race to rescue the queen, but Verone`s petrifying ability impedes them. Santori attempts to have some fun in his battle with Seth and ends up causing him to go berserk. Santori then talks about using people as if they were tools, causing him to explode with rage. Ocoho and Melie are also boiling with resentment in their respective battles against Doussant and Liselotte.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagayaku wa Hito no Ishi: Resistance
La volonté des gens scintille: Resistance
The Will of the People Shines Bright: Resistance
